summary: Alex, a hit man, tries to get out of the family business, but his father won't let him do so. While seeking the help of a therapist, he meets a sexually charged 23-year-old woman with whom he falls in love.
cast: William H. Macy|John Ritter|Neve Campbell|Donald Sutherland|Tracey Ullman|Barbara Bain|David Dorfman|Tina Lifford|Bix Barnaba|Nicholle Tom|Thomas Curtis|Andrea Baker|Steven Moreno|Erica Ortega|Greg Pitts|Stewart J. Zully|Miguel Sandoval|Nick Cassavetes|Steve Valentine
keywords: taking off shirt|taking off a shirt|woman taking off shirt|young woman|young girl
title: Panic
